metadata.title: CVE-2023-6870 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Applications which spawn a Toast notification in a background thread mayhave obscured fullscreen notifications displayed by Firefox. *This issueonly affects Android versions of Firefox and Firefox Focus.* Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: mozjs78: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
